DOC.brief_summary: This large randomized double-blind clinical trial (esmolol vs placebo) will enroll patients undergoing cardiac surgery to study the additive cardiac protection of this therapeutic strategy.
DOC.criteria: end diastolic diameter >60 mm and an ejection fraction <50% written informed consent age >18 years previous unusual response to esmolol inclusion in other randomized studies esmolol administration in the previous 30 days emergency operation
